Question: This person played the role of a veteran thief who witnesses the Secret Service cover up of a murder.
Hints: This person has possessed a passion for music all his life.
This person has contributed to over 50 films over his career as actor, director, producer, and composer.
With a production cost of $20 million, (US$47.6 million in 2013 dollars) it was this person's highest budget film to date.
